createTable.remarks: Holds a business application data scope

column.name: name
column.remarks: The (application unique) name of the scope

column.name: description
column.remarks: A free-text description of the scope

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: The identifier of the application defining the scope

column.name: active_from
column.remarks: The date and time when the scope becomes applicable/usable

column.name: active_to
column.remarks: The date and time when the scope stops being applicable/usable

column.name: data_from
column.remarks: For temporal data, the start of the (data) time window

column.name: data_to
column.remarks: For temporal data, the end of the (data) time window

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: The name of the user who created the entry

column.name: created_on
column.remarks: The date and time the entry was created

column.name: modified_by
column.remarks: The name of the user who performed the last update on the entry

column.name: modified_on
column.remarks: The date and time the entry was last updated
